sn51.2:1.1: “Mendicants, whoever has missed out on the four bases of psychic power has missed out on the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
sn51.2:1.2: Whoever has undertaken the four bases of psychic power has undertaken the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
sn51.2:1.4: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm …
sn51.2:1.8: Whoever has missed out on these four bases of psychic power has missed out on the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
sn51.2:1.9: Whoever has undertaken these four bases of psychic power has undertaken the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.”
